amendatorysection.para: The mayor shall have such jurisdiction as may be vested in him by ordinance, over all places within the city or within three miles of the corporate limits of the city and outside of any organized city or village, for the enforcement of the health ordinances and regulations thereof, and for the purpose of carrying out the provisions of all such ordinances except the ordinances respecting taxation shall not be enforced outside of the corporate limits of such primary city.
